title: Does a HIPAA ‘Medical Hack’ Avoid Insurance Claim Denials?
subtitle: A "HIPAA medical hack" likely won't help you circumvent a denial of coverage notice issued by your health insurer.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Patients can circumvent insurance company claim denials by requesting a specific form of documentation, as the insurance company will opt to simply cover the cost rather than provide the paperwork.
